comment: The main content area containing Chinese characters in seal script with phonetic annotations (反切), arranged in vertical columns. The text is enclosed within a thick black border. On the left margin, there is a vertical label '大五十' (Dà Wǔshí) indicating page or section number, and at the bottom-left corner, the name '陳廣' (Chén Guǎng) appears, likely the engraver or publisher.
